generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings and crosswalks, typical of a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the road, bordered by curbs and where cars are parked, is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and on the right side of the image, including commercial structures with signs.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible throughout the image, lining the streets and sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible crossing the road in the middle of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked on the right side of the road, and one is partially visible on the left side.
- traffic sign: A blue pedestrian crossing sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the one holding the pedestrian crossing sign and others along the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk near the pedestrian crossing sign.
